Package ru.nsu.fit.smolyakov.caclulator.operationsprovider

Interface OperationsProvider<T>

Type Parameters:
T - a type of operands
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractOperationsProvider, ComplexOperationsProvider, DoubleOperationsProvider
public interface OperationsProvider<T>
An interface responsible for providing operations for Calculator. Contains only getByName(String) method, which returns an Operation by its name.

As calculator treats everything as a function, it is supposed that operands are returned as suppliers (0-arity functions).

See Also:

  • Method Details

    • getByName

      Operation<T> getByName(String name)
      Returns an Operation associated with specified name. If there is no such operators, then name is parsed according to operand pattern.
      Parameters:
      name - a name of an operation
      Returns:
      an operation associated with name
      Throws:
      NumberFormatException - if name is either not connected to any operation and doesn't match the format of operand

    • getOptionalByName

      default Optional<Operation<T>> getOptionalByName(String name)
      Returns an Optional of an Operation associated with specified name. If there is no such operators, then name is parsed according to operand pattern.
      Parameters:
      name - a name of an operation
      Returns:
      an Optional of an operation associated with name if one exists, Optional.empty() otherwise
